conclusion: To determine the magnitude of the frictional force exerted by the ground on the long wooden board ab, we need to analyze the forces acting on both the wooden block P and the long wooden board ab.

conclusion: The magnitude of the frictional force exerted by the ground on the long wooden board ab is μ2 mg.
